description: Verify that the home page loads correctly when accessing the root URL
scenario: User navigates to the home page by typing the URL and expecting to see all content sections
expected_results: Display the complete home page with hero section, features, learning modules, and CTA sections
procedure:
1. Open web browser
2. Navigate to `http://localhost:5000/`
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check all sections are visible (Hero, Features, Learning Modules, CTA)

description: Verify home page displays correctly on mobile devices
scenario: User accesses the site from a mobile device
expected_results: Page layout adapts to mobile screen with readable text and functional buttons
procedure:
1. Open browser developer tools
2. Set viewport to mobile size (375x667)
3. Navigate to home page
4. Verify responsive layout and button accessibility

description: Verify home page loads within acceptable time and resources
scenario: User accesses the site and expects fast loading times
expected_results: Page loads within 3 seconds and CSS/JS files load correctly
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache
2. Open browser developer tools Network tab
3. Navigate to home page
4. Verify page load time under 3 seconds
5. Check all CSS and JS files load successfully

description: Verify authenticated user can navigate to levels overview from home page
scenario: Authenticated user clicks on learning buttons to continue their progress
expected_results: User is redirected to levels overview page when clicking 'Start Learning' or 'Continue Learning'
procedure:
1. Login as authenticated user
2. Navigate to home page
3. Click 'Start Learning' or 'Continue Learning' button
4. Verify redirection to levels overview

description: Verify unauthenticated user is directed to signup from home page
scenario: New user visits the site and wants to get started
expected_results: User is redirected to signup page when clicking 'Get Started'
procedure:
1. Ensure user is not logged in
2. Navigate to home page
3. Click 'Get Started' button
4. Verify redirection to signup page
